Add testing script for artistic credits management

Created utility scripts to add artistic credits to user accounts for testing purposes.

- add_credits_temp.py: Add credits to specific user
- add_credits_simple.py: Add credits to all users
- Added 500 test credits to user 104 (total: 700 credits)

Testing Features:
- Credit system validation
- AI image generation
- Voice journaling
- Relationship profiles
- Mini Studio access
